channel.title: Client/Cache Help ASAP
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i purchased a vps a few days ago and i am now really angry that it is going ALL to waste. I have had it for like 10 days and have not used it once and i am very upset of this because i only purchased a month.
The problem i am having is that when people download my cache it says "error loading... contact staff!" and i do not know how to fix it. People said my client cannot read the cache and i changed everything it still dont work.. I need help asap someone please.
Skype: Saeed_778866
Questions: Q1: How do i make a new cache? i copied all the files INSIDE the cache folder and upload to dropbox and when others download they dont get all the files that i upload Q2: Which folders do i change from 127.0.0.1 to my VPS ip? gui? client? server? i dont get it..
It will be VERY appreciated if someone helps me. I Will love you f0r3v3r!
Note: Cache IS in c drive.. http://gyazo.com/1bcb0617154a0344271408d5ee87b536 http://gyazo.com/0ff9a32dcf0f50510f4c73858b37683c

item.title: Client/Cache Help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @XSaeedX XSaeedX
item.description:
@XSaeedX wrote:

Hello everyone, i purchased a vps a few days ago and i am now really angry that it is going ALL to waste. I have had it for like 10 days and have not used it once and i am very upset of this because i only purchased a month.

The problem i am having is that when people download my cache it says “error loading… contact staff!” and i do not know how to fix it. People said my client cannot read the cache and i changed everything it still dont work… I need help asap someone please.

Skype: Saeed_778866

Questions:
Q1: How do i make a new cache? i copied all the files INSIDE the cache folder and upload to dropbox and when others download they dont get all the files that i upload
Q2: Which folders do i change from 127.0.0.1 to my VPS ip? gui? client? server? i dont get it…

It will be VERY appreciated if someone helps me. I Will love you f0r3v3r!

Note: Cache IS in c drive…
